meta.title: ChefWise - Smart Recipe Cost Calculator
meta.description: Track supermarket prices, calculate recipe costs, and make smarter cooking decisions. Compare prices, track history, and share your favorite recipes.

hero.title: Calculate the True Cost of
hero.subtitle: Track supermarket prices, create recipes, and discover if cooking at home really saves money. Make informed decisions with real data.

features.title: Everything You Need to Cook Smart
features.subtitle: Powerful features to help you track, calculate, and optimize your cooking costs.

feature1.title: Track Product Prices
feature1.description: Keep track of prices from multiple supermarkets with quantity and unit information. Know exactly what you're paying.

feature2.title: Create Recipes
feature2.description: Build your recipe collection by combining products as ingredients. Organize all your favorite dishes in one place.

feature3.title: Calculate True Costs
feature3.description: Instantly calculate the real cost of any recipe based on current product prices. No more guessing or estimating.

feature4.title: Compare Supermarkets
feature4.description: See which store offers the best prices for your recipes. Make data-driven shopping decisions.

feature5.title: Track Price History
feature5.description: Monitor how prices change over time. Identify trends and buy at the best moments.

feature6.title: Share Recipes
feature6.description: Share your recipes publicly with unique links. Let others discover your culinary creations.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in four simple steps and start making smarter cooking decisions today.

step1.title: Add Your Supermarkets
step1.description: Start by adding the stores where you shop. Include locations and logos to keep everything organized.

step2.title: Track Product Prices
step2.description: Add products with their current prices, quantities, and units. Update prices as they change to maintain accurate data.

step3.title: Create Your Recipes
step3.description: Build recipes by selecting products as ingredients. Specify quantities for each ingredient and set serving sizes.

step4.title: Calculate & Compare
step4.description: Instantly see the total cost and cost per serving. Compare recipes and find the most economical options.

benefits.title: Why Choose ChefWise?
benefits.subtitle: Make better decisions about cooking at home vs eating out.

benefit1.title: Save Money
benefit1.description: Know exactly how much your recipes cost and find cheaper alternatives without sacrificing quality.

benefit2.title: Save Time
benefit2.description: No more manual calculations. Get instant cost breakdowns and spend more time cooking.

benefit3.title: Make Informed Decisions
benefit3.description: Compare cooking at home vs buying ready-made items with real data, not estimates.

benefit4.title: Track Trends
benefit4.description: See how product prices change over time and plan your shopping accordingly.

cta.title: Ready to Cook Smarter?
cta.subtitle: Join ChefWise today and start tracking your recipe costs for free.

footer.tagline: Smart recipe cost calculator for home cooks.

hero.title: Nuxt Boilerplate
hero.subtitle: Unofficial
hero.description: A ready to use starter kit for all kinds of projects
